biotools.summary: scSNV is an accurate dscRNA-seq SNV co-expression analysis using duplicate tag collapsing. scSNV is an alternative to Cell Ranger + velocyto for the alignment, quantification and SNV calling of 10X Single Cell RNA-seq data. Currently, scSNV supports 10X 5-prime and 3-prime 10X version 2 and 3 libraries.
